abstract: “Night Talk,” the prime time program on Bloomberg Television, is coming to an end.
snippet: “Night Talk,” the prime time program on Bloomberg Television, is coming to an end.
lead_paragraph: Bloomberg cancels ‘Night Talk’ | “Night Talk,” the prime time program on Bloomberg Television, is coming to an end. Mike Schneider, the anchor of the 10 p.m. program, is departing the channel, a spokeswoman confirmed Tuesday. In addition to “Night Talk,” which specialized in long-form conversations with newsmakers, Mr. Schneider had hosted the 6 p.m. hour on the business news channel.
